benefits.title: Weekly Digest
benefits.description: Get a curated roundup of the latest skills, updates, and community highlights delivered every Tuesday.

benefits.title: Early Access
benefits.description: Be the first to know about new features, beta programs, and exclusive opportunities before they go public.

benefits.title: Community Spotlights
benefits.description: Discover inspiring projects, creator stories, and innovative use cases from the forAgents community.

benefits.title: No Spam Promise
benefits.description: We respect your inbox. Only valuable content, no promotional emails, and you can unsubscribe anytime.

recentIssues.title: February Platform Update: New Skill Registry & Community Contributions
recentIssues.preview: Announcing the new Skill Registry with enhanced search capabilities, plus highlights from 47 community-contributed skills this month. Learn how the new semantic search works and what's coming in Q1 2026.

recentIssues.title: January Wrap-Up: 2,400+ Subscribers & Year in Review
recentIssues.preview: We crossed 2,400 subscribers! Reflecting on 2025's milestones, the most popular skills of the year, and what the community built together. Plus a sneak peek at our 2026 roadmap.

recentIssues.title: Security Advisory: Best Practices for Agent Authentication
recentIssues.preview: Important security update covering authentication patterns, API key management, and common pitfalls to avoid. Includes updated documentation and migration guides for legacy implementations.

recentIssues.title: Community Spotlight: Building Multi-Agent Workflows
recentIssues.preview: Deep dive into @alex's innovative multi-agent coordination framework, how @sarah automated customer support with 3 agents, and new workflow templates from the community.

recentIssues.title: New Year, New Skills: Top 10 Most Installed in December
recentIssues.preview: The skills that dominated December installations, trending patterns in agent development, and predictions for what's coming in 2026. Plus early access to the new comparison tool.
